plugins.Name: Calculator
plugins.Description: Does mathematical calculations (e.g. 5*3-2).
plugins.Author: cxfksword

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Use English (United States) number format for input
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: Ignores your system setting and expects numbers in the format '1,000.55'.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Use English (United States) number format for output
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: Ignores your system setting and returns numbers in the format '1000.55'.

plugins.Name: Folder
plugins.Description: Navigates folders starting from a drive letter 'C:\' or from the user home '~'.
plugins.Author: qianlifeng

plugins.Name: History
plugins.Description: Quick access to previously selected results.
plugins.Author: jefflord

plugins.Name: Windows Search
plugins.Description: Searches files and folders.
plugins.Author: Microsoft

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Disable non-indexed files warning

plugins.Name: OneNote
plugins.Description: Searches your local OneNote notebooks. This plugin requires the OneNote desktop app which is included in Microsoft Office.
plugins.Author: palenshus

plugins.Name: PowerToys
plugins.Description: Open PowerToys utilities and settings.
plugins.Author: davidegiacometti

plugins.Name: Program
plugins.Description: Searches programs.
plugins.Author: qianlifeng

plugins.Name: Registry Plugin
plugins.Description: Navigates inside the Windows Registry.
plugins.Author: TobiasSekan

plugins.Name: Service
plugins.Description: Manages Windows services.
plugins.Author: davidegiacometti

plugins.Name: Shell
plugins.Description: Executes commands (e.g 'ping', 'cmd').
plugins.Author: qianlifeng

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Keep shell open

plugins.Name: Windows System Commands
plugins.Description: Executes system commands (e.g. 'shutdown', 'lock', 'sleep').
plugins.Author: Wox

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Show a dialog to confirm system commands
Show a success message after emptying the Recycle Bin
Use localized system commands instead of English ones
Show separate result for Empty Recycle Bin command
Reduce the priority of 'IP' and 'MAC' results to improve the order in the global results
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: With this setting enabled, you have to type more characters to find the results.

plugins.Name: Time and Date
plugins.Description: Provides time and date values for the system time or a custom time stamp (Examples: 'Day', 'Day::2023-09-06', 'Time::21:41:35', 'Calendar week::2023-09-06')
plugins.Author: htcfreek

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Show only 'Time', 'Date' and 'Now' result for system time on global queries
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: Regardless of this setting, for global queries the first word of the query has to be a complete match.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Show time with seconds
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: This setting applies to the 'Time' and 'Now' result.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Show date with weekday and name of month
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: This setting applies to the 'Date' and 'Now' result.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Hide 'Invalid number input' error message on global queries

plugins.Name: Unit Converter
plugins.Description: Provides unit conversion (e.g. 10 ft in m).
plugins.Author: ThiefZero

plugins.Name: URI Handler
plugins.Description: Opens URLs and UNC network shares.
plugins.Author: Microsoft

plugins.Name: Value Generator
plugins.Description: A plugin to calculate hashes and generate values.
plugins.Author: IHorvalds

plugins.Name: Visual Studio Code Workspaces
plugins.Description: Opens workspaces, remote machines (SSH or Codespaces) and containers, previously opened in VS Code. The VS Code instance needs to be in PATH.
plugins.Author: ricardosantos9521

plugins.Name: Web Search
plugins.Description: Search the web with your default search engine.
plugins.Author: cyberrex5

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Don't include in global results on queries that are URIs

plugins.Name: Windows settings
plugins.Description: Plugin to search for Windows settings
plugins.Author: TobiasSekan

plugins.Name: Windows Terminal
plugins.Description: Open Windows Terminal profiles.
plugins.Author: davidegiacometti

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Open profiles in a new tab
Open profiles in the quake window
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: Windows Terminal supports a "quake" feature where a terminal window is accessible using a global hotkey. Enable this option to open profiles in a new tab in this window.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Show hidden profiles

plugins.Name: Window Walker
plugins.Description: Switches between open windows.
plugins.Author: betadele

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Show only results from visible desktop
Show process id in the subtitle
Show desktop name in the subtitle
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: This information is only shown in subtitle and tool tip, if you have at least two desktops.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Request confirmation when killing a process
Kill process and its child processes
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: Be careful when activating this. Killing the whole process tree can lead to problematic application crashes.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Stay open after closing windows and killing processes
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: This feature won't work if the kill process confirmation is enabled.

AdditionalOptions.DisplayLabel: Hide "kill process" button if additional permissions required
Hide Explorer process information
AdditionalOptions.DisplayDescription: This message is only shown when searching with a direct activation command.
